definitions.text: someone whose employment involves carrying something
examples: the bonds were transmitted by carrier

definitions.text: a self-propelled wheeled vehicle designed specifically to carry something
examples: refrigerated carriers have revolutionized the grocery business

definitions.text: a large warship that carries planes and has a long flat deck for takeoffs and landings
an inactive substance that is a vehicle for a radioactive tracer of the same substance and that assists in its recovery after some chemical reaction
a person or firm in the business of transporting people or goods or messages
a radio wave that can be modulated in order to transmit a signal
a man who delivers the mail
(medicine) a person (or animal) who has some pathogen to which he is immune but who can pass it on to others
a rack attached to a vehicle; for carrying luggage or skis or the like
(genetics) an organism that possesses a recessive gene whose effect is masked by a dominant allele; the associated trait is not apparent but can be passed on to offspring
